title: Why i cant get my bonus loot? like case or key
body:
Why i cant get my bonus loot? like case or key? then i will get it pliz say i want know :( what i need to do? or what??? ;(

P.S sorry for my bad english

replies.body: Accounts that have recently been penalized by the[ Instant Feedback System ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-)can't earn loot until it's proven to be a stand up member of the community.  If you feel that's the case for you, you can check out our [hextech restrictions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463-Hextech-Crafting-Restrictions)guide for information about how the system works, and restoring eligibility.  If you have further questions about this, reach out to your peers on the [player behavior boards](http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour-en).  Best of luck!
